questions.quote: Hey! Look who's here! Hey Kurt, this is Jerry, and George, and Kramer.
There's this blind guy at a party I was at, and he felt my face for a really long time. You know, to see what I looked like. He almost put his finger up my nose.
Oh, did you guys stop at the bodega today? Some moron bounced a clown check!
I had a feeling you would like it. No, don't try it on now, try it on later.
And I'm going to have an English muffin with margarine on the side and a cup of coffee.
Jerry, we got 'im. I'm riding his tail. There's no escape. He's running scared, buddy.
Oh. Probably they think you're too good for them. You know, because of the car.
I thought that new promotion was supposed to be a lot more work.
You know how hard it was for me to get that appointment for you? You can't just walk in on this guy. He did me a personal favor.
I'll tell ya, if I had one of these things, I'd be eatin' hot dogs all the time.
